pages.text: $(li)The Lapis Lazuli is rock with magic propierties that can be found and mined in the Caves.$(br)$(li)It can be found in Loot Chests too.$(br)$(li)The Lapis Lazuli is a needed material to do Enchanting.
$(li)You can use Lapis Lazuli to craft a Blue Dye, Lapis Lazuli Armor or a Lapis Lazuli Block in a Crafting Table.
